content.body: Yeah https://github.com/whatwg/html/pull/10235 concluded with us realizing that a straightforward spec wouldn't necessarily match Chrome's implementation, so, we wanted to do more investigation and write more tests. I suspect jarhar got pulled into other things though. I also heard Dominic Farolino might help with the investigation/spec work.
